page.title: 14MEDIA
page.content: 9856{PAPERS}WERE SOLD ONE WEEK IN JUNE.THE MOST COMMON PAPERS WERE THE DAILY RECORD (6215) ,THE DAILY EXPRESS (1225) AND THE SUN (1180). THE LOCAL PAPER IS THE{COURIER}WHICH TELLS THE LOCAL NEWS, PROVIDES ENTERTAINMENT AND TELLS THE WEEKEND T.V.PROGRAMMES. THE{T.V. STATIONS}ARE BBC1,BBC2, STV,AND CHANNEL 4.HERE ARE SOME PROGRAMMES ON A SELECTION OF THEM: KENNY EVERETT,DALLAS,THE YOUNG ONES,PAUL DANIELS MAGIC SHOW,TOP OF THE POPS AND CORONATION STREET THE MOST POPULAR{RADIO STATION}IS RADIO FORTH.WE CAN ALSO GET RADIO 1(MAINLY POP MUSIC) RADIO LUXEMBURG (AT NIGHT ONLY)RADIO SCOTLAND-WHICH DEALS MAINLY WITH SCOTTISH NEWS. THERE ARE THREE{VIDEO SHOPS}IN ARMADALE.
